message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.GT, cs.CY, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of a data glove and serious game to improve motor skill acquisition, which involves human-computer interaction (HCI) and graphics (GR). The use of serious games also falls under the category of game theory (GT). The study involves a comparison of two groups, which could fall under the category of cybernetics (CY). Finally, the use of the data glove for control could also fall under the category of robotics (RO).
